entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
